ygData.msgSnippet: Dark Convoy picks up Liono by his head starts to squeeze Fight back Little man or I will crush your skull like a walnut. Maybe when I m through with you I

Received: from RgDaN@... by imo-d03.mx.aol.com (mail_out_v27.10.) id a.46.7cf897b (4258) for <nbwrpg@egroups.com>; Sat, 8 Jul 2000 23:03:28 -0400 (EDT)
Message-ID: <46.7cf897b.26994580@...>
Date: Sat, 8 Jul 2000 23:03:28 EDT
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: AOL 5.0 for Windows sub 109
From: RgDaN@...

Dark Convoy picks up Liono by his head starts to squeeze "Fight back Little 
man or I will crush your skull like a walnut. Maybe when I'm through with you 
I handle that little girlfriend of yours"

Lio Convoy Grabs Darks forearm and brings up his knee hammering it into Darks 
wrist causing him to let go Lio starts back flipping get a little ways away 
"Your not going to touch her. Command line target one." A red line extends 
from lio arms and he fires a golden circle disk at Dark.

Dark slides to the left barely getting out of the way as the disk cut down a 
tree. "You can't be my little brother he would have had more will to fight 
than this."  A long green triangular blade extends from his wrist. A he take 
off at full speed towards Lio.

Lio draws the Lionhart hears the com transmission and takes off towards Dark 
Convoy.

As both Warriors leap into the air there is clanging of steel as  each 
landing on the other side.

Dark Convoy laughs evilly  suddenly a gash appears on his shoulder "What in 
the my my the old dog know a few tricks." Starts to gather his some energy 
"Maybe its time I showed you a little less mercy."

Lio Convoy grins and goes on comlink "I'll be there as soon as possible just 
hold on Tocar."

Dark Convoy opens his hand and fires a basketball sized plasma ball at Lio.

Lio eyes turn blue as he fires a ray optical beam into the plasma ball it 
starts to slow and turn solid into a ball of Ice. Lio kicks the ball of ice 
straight into Dark Convoy hitting him chest knocking him into a tree.

Dark Convoy stands up "play times over" 

Lio shoots a blast a Dark.

Dark slides out the way with almost a dancers grace but as he moves a Black 
shadow like outline lingers behind him.

Lio looks at the outline "That's not outline that his energy signature."
